thread.title: Ball’s one-on-one game with MJ gets impersonated

title: Ball’s one-on-one game with MJ gets impersonated
text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Ball’s one-on-one game with MJ gets impersonated Classic. Post to Facebook Ball’s one-on-one game with MJ gets impersonated Classic. Check out this story on USATODAY.com: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/03/lavar-ball-one-on-one-michael-jordan-impersonated-brandon-armstrong-bdotadot5-video-ucla-nba Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address.   Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Ball’s one-on-one game with MJ gets impersonated Andrew Joseph 4:56 p.m. ET March 20, 2017 
LaVar Ball, the father of UCLA star Lonzo Ball, claimed that he would "kill" Michael Jordan in one-on-one back in his heyday. 
It was a ridiculous claim, being that Jordan is the best basketball player ever while LaVar averaged 2 points per game at Washington State before transferring. That one-on-one game will likely never happen, but our favorite NBA impersonator, Brandon Armstrong, put together an excellent simulation of the would-be matchup. 
Well done. 
The only way this video would have been better is if the two dressed to character. We needed Armstrong to be rocking some Big Baller Brand apparel while his friend, @famouslos32, wears a Charlotte Hornets uniform. 
Otherwise, excellent job. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/03/lavar-ball-one-on-one-michael-jordan-impersonated-brandon-armstrong-bdotadot5-video-ucla-nba Most Popular
